Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/ants: I used to go to sleep hugging my terrarium, but I kept getting ants in my bed...
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/bed/: She doesn't believe me when I tell her I'm nocturnal!
Mama says we have to go to bed.
Some people count sheep to fall asleep, but I like to count beetles.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/big_: It sure would be neat if the Dragonguard could all ride big ants!
I had a dream I was riding a big ant, like a horse.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/bigg: I wonder what's the biggest bug that ever lived in Mistria...
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/cate: Did you know a caterpillar can survive on only one large leaf a day? Amazing.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/coco: Sometimes, at night, I twirl up my sheets and pretend I'm in a cocoon!
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/cool: Good night, [Ari]. Be sure to wake me up if you see a cool bug.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/dad_: Bella the orchid mantis likes when Papa plays the lute. She kind of sways around...
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/dell: She's cool and strong, but most importantly she listens to me talk about bugs.
There is a non-zero probability that Dell will jump in that fountain.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/dinn: Dinner is very important! That's what Doctor Valen told me!
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/gian: Mr. Errol says insects used to be REALLY ginormous in the past. I wanna see!
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/goin: It takes me a while to go to sleep because I have to say good night to all my bugs, going in alphabetical order by genus.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/good: [Ari], [Ari]! How'd you get so good at catching bugs?
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/grea: Wow, [Ari]! You're like a legendary bugcatcher!
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/gree: Excellent. My name's Luc! I'm so excited to have a fellow insect enthusiast in town. Finally!
Wait until I tell my sisters!
You know, insects? My name's Luc and I'm a junior member of The Royal Society of Entomology.
I get a birthday card from them every year in recognition of my work. If you join, maybe you will too!
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/hayd: Mister Hayden sure is nice... I like him.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/hung: I'm hungry, and sleepy... like a sleepy, hungry caterpillar...
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/i_li: If you see one you gotta let me know, okay?
Do you like bugs, [Ari]? I think they're pretty neat.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/inse: The Dragonguard spy network is all the insects I've trained to bring me information. It's, um... still a work in progress.
Dell says we'll explore there, when we're older. That's good, I'll be less scared by then.
I wonder what kind of insects are in the Mines!
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/loos: I wonder how Arthur keeps getting out... I should record this in my Tarantula File.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/marr: I don't get it, but I'll do it for the kingdom!
Queen Maple says she's marrying me off to a princess I've never met for political reasons, and if I'm lucky it might grow into love.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/mom_: Mama keeps kicking Daddy under the table... I wonder if he's in trouble.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/morn: Morning, [Ari]! I'm thinking about what bugs the day will bring...
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/most: Most people think monarch butterfly, but I like sternocera aequisignata- the jewel beetle- way more.
Maple asked me which bug is the most royal.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/need: Mom packed us lots of snacks, [Ari]! Here, you can have some.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/orch: Maybe she went to the kitchen for a snack?
Hi [Ari]. I'm supposed to be sleeping, but Bella the orchid mantis got out.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/quee: I'm teaching Maple about the worker bees of apis mellifera, but she only cares about the queen bee.
I promised Maple we'd play royals today, so for the rest of today she's Queen Maple.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/rach: Rachelle woke me up today... she's a mantis religiosa, otherwise known as a praying mantis.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/rain: Some insects prefer to come out on rainy days, [Ari].
Dell likes to hold our Dragonguard meetings on rainy days. That's when we make all our plans for protecting Mistria!
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/regi: Ma and Pa are busy today, so I'm watching the register. I can make change, I'm good at math! Want to see?
I like helping out, but I sure wish I could see over the counter.
According to my calculations, today has seen a fifty percent boost in sales because I'm behind the counter.
I mean, um, The Sleeping Dragon Inn.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/roya: Queen Maple says it's time to partake of our royal dinner. I hope that's the same as our normal dinner.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/seen: Have you seen any beehives around? Why? Uh... no reason...
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/teac: Bees have a queen, but they can't have two, so one has to leave... and sometimes they fight it out for the crown!
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/trav: Miss Juniper will answer all the Dragonguard's questions about potions... I think.
Time to get all curled up in my honeycomb...
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/week: Tall grass is a natural habitat for many insects.
Vegetables are a good habitat too, I guess.
Greetings, [Ari]! Have you cut the grass around your farm yet?
Sometimes there's insects living underneath! I'd love to see what you find!
[Ari]! Have you broken up the rocks around your farm?
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Banked Lines/wish: *sigh* Wish Dad would take us to the woods sometime. I bet I could find a beehive there.
